text: (He paigambara sallallaho alaihe vasallama!) Juna allahale tapa'imathi ‘‘kura'ana’’ avatarita gareko cha, usale tapa'ila'i punah pahileko sthanatira pharka'unevala cha. Bhanidinus ki mero palanakartale tyasala'i pani ramrari jandacha, jasale margadarsana prapta gareko cha ra usala'i pani jo spastarupale margavicalita cha
